reg_mobile_message: Please provide your 10 digit registered mobile number to proceed
gustmessage: Thank you for choosing our hospital for your healthcare needs. We constantly work to improve and meet your expectations. To serve our patients better, kindly spare a few minutes to fill out this feedback form. Your opinion is of immense value to us.
detractor: Please describe reason for low rating
recommendationmessage: On a scale from 0-10, how likely are you to recommend this hospital to your friends or family members?
yourreason: Your reason for selecting our hospital
recognizeateam: Please help us recognize a staff member of our hospital who may have performed services beyond your expectations.
happythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
unhappythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
kpi_info: 1. PSQ3a - Time taken for initial assessment of indoor patients
kpi_def: The time shall begin from the time that the patient has arrived at the bed of the ward till the time that the initial assessment has been completed by a doctor
formula_para1: Time at which patient got admitted (in 24hr format)
formula_para2: Time at which the doctor completed initial assessment (in 24hr format)
doctor_advice: Time at which doctor adviced discharge (in 24hr format)
bill_paid: Time at which bill paid (in 24hr format)
obstruction: Is the area free of obstruction?
rails: Are the stairs and grab rails in good condition?
avoid_falls: Are the floors free of liquids to avoid trips and falls?
warning_signages: Are warning signages placed wherever necessary?
glare: Is there direct or reflected glare?
night_lights: Are night lights fitted and in good condition?
cords_damaged: Are the power cords frayed or damaged?
safety_mats: Are adequate safety mats placed in electrical areas?
fire_prevent: Are enough precautions taken to prevent fire?
cords_conditions: Are plugs and cords in good condition?
sufficient_oxygen: Is there sufficient oxygen in the cylinders?
ro_water: Is the RO water changed regularly and dated?
cylinder_chart: Is there an oxygen cylinder monitoring chart?
cylinder_stand: Is there a trolley/stand provided for the oxygen cylinder?
biohazard: Is the bio-hazard symbol present on the containers?
segregation: Is waste segregation according to the color code?
containers_fill: Are the containers less than 3/4 filled up?
kit_accessible: Is the spill kit readily accessible?
staff_knowledge: Is the knowledge of staff adequate?
vial_needle: Is there no needle kept in the vial?
opening_date: Is the date of opening recorded?
storage: Is the storage under proper conditions?
temperature_chart: Is there a temperature monitoring chart?
temperature_limits: Is the temperature within normal limits?
medical_items: Are there no non-medical items in the refrigerator?
expired_medicine: Are there no expired/over-dated medicines in the refrigerator?
medicines_avail: Are all medicines as per the list available?
medicines_near_exp: Are the medicines within 2 months of expiry or near expiry?
overdated: Are there no expired or over-dated medicines?
extra_medicines: Are additional or extra medicines present (mismatches in the stock)?
hazardous_material: Is the material safety data sheet available for all hazardous material used?
msds_sheet: Are employees trained on how to locate, read, and understand an MSDS sheet?
workplace_storage: Is the storage of minimal quantities in the workplace maintained?
extinguishers_avail: Are the fire extinguishers available in the area expired?
safety_trained: Are the staff trained on fire safety?
exit_route: Is the exit route free of obstacles?
extinguishers_maintained: Are the fire extinguishers properly maintained (checklist)?
exit_signages: Are the fire exit signages placed?
use_ppe: Is there the use of adequate PPE in the workplace?
staff_trained: Are the staff trained in the proper use of PPE?
safety_devices: Is the use of appropriate safety measures/devices in the workplace maintained?
work_station_neat: Is the work station and entire premises neat and tidy?
equipment_accidents: Is the placement of furniture, overhead storage, equipment, etc. likely to cause accidents?
log_sheet: Is the equipment log sheet available?
equipment_maintain: Are the equipment maintained in working condition?
patient_right_visible: Are the patient rights and responsibilities visible?
mission: Are the mission and vision properly placed?
bm_waste_store: Is the BM waste properly stored?
bm_waste_record: Are the BM waste's weight and bag number properly recorded?
storage_area: Is the storage area clean and maintained?
tank_cleaning: Is the tank cleaning checklist maintained?
plant_maintain: Is the RO plant maintenance checklist maintained?
transformer_status: Is the status of the transformer documented?
generators_status: Is the status of backup generators documented?
electrical_areas: Are adequate safety mats placed in electrical areas?
electrical_boxes: Are all electrical boxes, ELCBs properly maintained?
precautions_to_fire: Are enough precautions taken to prevent fire?
cylinders_chained: Are the cylinders properly chained in storage areas?
empty_cylinders: Can empty/full cylinders be easily identified?
warning_signage: Are warning signages placed wherever necessary?
